name: Danny's Daydream
description:
Instructions :

W,S,A,D - Move 

Mouse - Turn 

LMB - Shoot 

Shoot the spiders,Get close to the crystals to grab them. Once all the crystals are grabbed, you can exit through the door.

Avoid falling off 

Blue pickup- Restores Health 

Red pickup- Ammo

[This is a very early version of the game and doesn't represent the final product]
